alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 7:25PM CDT until August 13 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Woods County in northwestern Oklahoma... Eastern Harper County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 725 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Supply, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodward, Buffalo, Fargo, Fort Supply, Freedom, May, Alabaster Caverns State Park, Selman, Tangier, and Camp Houston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
